text: Over the years, Mario has become a famous video game character. He stars in many video games and even has his own series of video games and its spinoff series, the Donkey Kong, Yoshi, and Wario series. The following course of video games Mario has appeared in over the years is listed below: == Home consoles == === Nintendo Entertainment System === Title Developer Year Donkey Kong Nintendo EAD 1981 Donkey Kong Classics Nintendo EAD 1988 Donkey Kong Jr. Nintendo EAD 1982 Dr. Mario Nintendo EAD 1990 Golf Nintendo EAD 1984 Mario Bros.
